audioText: Quand j'étais jeune, je croyais que tous les adultes savaient exactement quoi faire dans la vie.
question: What did the narrator believe when they were young?
options: That all adults knew exactly what to do in life.
That life would become easier as they got older.
That adults never made mistakes or had doubts.
That everyone had a clear plan for their future.
explanation: The text states 'Quand j'étais jeune, je croyais que tous les adultes savaient exactement quoi faire dans la vie' - When I was young, I believed that all adults knew exactly what to do in life. The narrator uses 'croyais' (imperfect of croire - I used to believe) to describe a past belief from childhood.
